# File lib/grit/git-ruby.rb, line 21
    def cat_file(options, ref)
      if options[:t]
        file_type(ref)
      elsif options[:s]
        file_size(ref)
      elsif options[:p]
        try_run { ruby_git.cat_file(ref) }
      end
    rescue Grit::GitRuby::Repository::NoSuchShaFound
      ''
    end
